00023 #ifndef _ASM
00024 #include "thread.h"
00025 
00026 extern "C" {
00027   /* First frame on thread execution stack
00028    *    - enable interrupts
00029    *    - rely on a struct kernel_context layout of the frame it is
00030    *      started. Used to retrieve the address of the
00031    *      StartThreadExecution wrapper (interrupts disabled), the
00032    *      function that it should then call (interrupts enabled) with
00033    *      its arguments, and the address of the ThreadFinish()
00034    *      wrapper.
00035    *    - when the thread function returns, if ever, call ThreadFinish().
00036    */
00037   void ThreadRoot();
00038   
00040   // and start running nextCtx
00041   void SWITCH(KernelContextT *curCtx, KernelContextT *nextCtx);
00042 
00044   // and start running nextCtx
00045   void SWITCH_NO_SAVE(KernelContextT *nextCtx);
00046 }
00047 #endif
